pyminer: Mined class¶

class pyminer.Mined(result, tdm_key=None)[source]¶

Mined: response class for mining Crossref articles



Mined Methods

  • links - links()
  • links_pdf - links_pdf()
  • links_xml - links_xml()
  • links_plain - links_plain()
  • links_unspecified - links_unspecified()
  • links_verbose - links_verbose()
  • fetch - fetch()
  • extract - extract()



fetch()[source]¶

Fetch articles

Returns:list of objects of class Fetched

Usage:

from pyminer import Miner
m = Miner()
x = m.search(ids = '10.3897/rio.2.e10445')
out = x.fetch()
out
out[0].url
out[0].path
out[0].type
out[0].parse()
links()[source]¶

Get all links

Returns:list with links; empty list if no results

Usage:

from pyminer import Miner
m = Miner()
x = m.search(ids = '10.1371/journal.pone.0033693')
x.links()
links_pdf()[source]¶

Get links with content-type of “application/pdf”

Returns:list with pdf links; empty list if no results

Usage:

from pyminer import Miner
m = Miner()
x = m.search(ids = '10.3897/rio.2.e10445')
x.links_pdf()
links_plain()[source]¶

Get links with content-type of “text/plain”

Returns:list with plain text links; empty list if no results

Usage:

from pyminer import Miner
m = Miner()
x = m.search(ids = '10.3897/rio.2.e10445')
x.links_plain()
links_unspecified()[source]¶

Get links that have content-type as “unspecified”

Returns:list with links; empty list if no results

Usage:

from pyminer import Miner
m = Miner()
x = m.search(ids = '10.3897/rio.2.e10445')
x.links_plain()
links_verbose()[source]¶

Get all link metadata

Returns:list of dicts; empty list if no results

Usage:

from pyminer import Miner
m = Miner()
x = m.search(ids = '10.3897/rio.2.e10445')
x.links_verbose()
links_xml()[source]¶

Get links with content-type of “text/xml”

Returns:list with xml links; empty list if no results

Usage:

from pyminer import Miner
m = Miner()
x = m.search(ids = '10.3897/rio.2.e10445')
x.links_xml()
